import { useState } from 'react'; import enairaLogo from '../assets/enairalogo.jpg' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const Nav = () => { const [openNav, setOpenNav] = useState(false) return (
{ openNav ? (
  • Home
  • About eNaira
  • eNaira Wallet
  • Key Features
  • Help
) : (
  • Home
  • About eNaira
  • eNaira Wallet
  • Key Features
  • Help
) } {/* Mobile Hamburger */}
); } export default Nav;
